TopicTitle: Bobbing in Space | A Machinima Tribute to Bob Kerman (and Squad)

Articles.Content:
Bob Kerman is stranded in orbit over Kerbin. Our recent mission to Minmus was a success, but for the fact that we forgot to pack a heat shield. Now Bob is out of fuel and drifting 2,000km up.

This video is a tribute to the brave Bob Kerman. We wish him the best of luck in getting home safely.

Please like, Comment and Subscribe if you want to see more Machinima action from Bob and the crew.
this is... amazing! makemoremakemore! what happens next?

Thanks! Glad you liked it. We livestreamed the recovery mission yesterday, that will be hitting youtube in the next day or two, but I may do a Machinima edit too because, well, it looks like people like them!

I was considering a complete machinima series based on the Kerbal Space Station. Could be interesting
